body_html:
Same here.
This what git blame says:
$ git show 22586bd configure
.
.

+echo >> tools/bazel.rc                                   
 for opt in $CC_OPT_FLAGS; do                             
-  write_to_bazelrc 'build:opt --cxxopt=$opt --copt=$opt' 
+  echo "build:opt --cxxopt=$opt --copt=$opt" >> tools/bazel.rc
 done

If I revert this code the compilation succeeds.

body:
Same here. This what git blame says: $ git show 22586bdf configure . . 
+echo >> tools/bazel.rc                                   
 for opt in $CC_OPT_FLAGS; do                             
-  write_to_bazelrc 'build:opt --cxxopt=$opt --copt=$opt' 
+  echo "build:opt --cxxopt=$opt --copt=$opt" >> tools/bazel.rc
 done
If I revert this code the compilation succeeds.
